protocols.title: CPR (Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation) - 2025 AHA Guidelines
protocols.description: Latest American Heart Association guidelines for adult CPR with emphasis on high-quality chest compressions and early AED use.

protocols.title: Choking Response - Adult & Child Protocol
protocols.description: Comprehensive choking management using back blows and abdominal thrusts, with modifications for pregnancy and obesity.

protocols.title: Stroke Recognition - BE-FAST Assessment
protocols.description: Enhanced stroke recognition protocol including balance and eye assessments for comprehensive stroke detection.

protocols.title: Hemorrhage Control - Stop the Bleed Protocol
protocols.description: Evidence-based bleeding control techniques including tourniquet application for life-threatening hemorrhage.

protocols.title: Acute Myocardial Infarction Management
protocols.description: Recognition and initial management of heart attack with focus on rapid EMS activation and aspirin administration.
